resources.string: SHAKE\nShake the phone in your hand as fast as you can for 15 seconds
360 SWING\nMake full circle with your hand for 15 seconds, while holding the phone in your hand. Your arm has to be straight.
JUMP UP\nJump 3 times as high as you can while holding the phone in your hand
SPEED TAP\nTap the screen with one finger as fast as you can for 15 seconds.
